## Materials
For this session we will need four datasets (two json and two csv). For the second part of this session we also need to download and install [gephi](https://gephi.org/).

### Data

[**MOMI All Data**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ehW7hgnzrWM1yB-V6P83DwkFZ-A8uLq1/view?usp=sharing)
Contains information about artworks and their provenance events (e.g., creation, acquisition, sales). Each record links an object to a sequence of events over time.

::: {.callout-note collapse="true" title="Data Dictionary"}
#### MOMI Data Dictionary
| Variable           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Example                                                                                                                                |
| ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **\_id**           | Internal numeric identifier for the record.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `1`                                                                                                                                    |
| **MOMI\_id**       | Unique MoMi identifier for the artwork.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `MOMI_2`                                                                                                                               |
| **title**          | Title of the artwork.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | *The Artist's Studio, Rue Visconti, Paris (Primary Title)*                                                                             |
| **author**         | Creator/artist, sometimes with external ID (ULAN).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | `Bazille, Frédéric [ulan:500004356]`                                                                                                   |
| **institution**    | Current holding institution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `Virginia Museum of Fine Arts`                                                                                                         |
| **url**            | Link to the object’s online record.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `https://www.vmfa.museum/...`                                                                                                          |
| **date**           | Creation date or year of the artwork.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `1867`                                                                                                                                 |
| **place**          | Place of creation (may be blank).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `Paris` / \`\`                                                                                                                         |
| **accessionID**    | Accession/catalogue number in the institution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `83.4`                                                                                                                                 |
| **provenance**     | Free-text provenance statement.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `"Collection of André Bazille... Gift to VMFA in 1983."`                                                                               |
| **notes**          | Additional curatorial or archival notes.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `"Sold on February 14, 1961. See VMFA Curatorial file."`                                                                               |
| **creditLine**     | Acquisition credit line.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `"Collection of Mr. and Mrs. Paul Mellon"`                                                                                             |
| **inscriptions**   | Inscriptions on the artwork.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `"Not signed."`                                                                                                                        |
| **exhibitions**    | List of exhibitions where the artwork was shown.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `"2019: Van Gogh, Monet, Degas..."`                                                                                                    |
| **bibliography**   | References and publications.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `"Tiller, Bertrand. Vues d’atelier. Paris, 2014."`                                                                                     |
| **medium**         | Material/technique.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `"oil on canvas"`                                                                                                                      |
| **dimensions**     | Physical dimensions, framed/unframed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `"25 1/2 × 19 in. (64.77 × 48.26 cm)"`                                                                                                 |
| **image**          | Link to image file.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `https://vmfa-dmz-new.piction.com/...`                                                                                                 |
| **WD**             | Wikidata ID and label.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `Q19962601___The Artist’s Studio...`                                                                                                   |
| **snapshotDate**   | Date of record snapshot.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `2021-10-17`                                                                                                                           |
| **status**         | Status of the record.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `"Automatically Acquired"`                                                                                                             |
| **provenanceData** | Structured provenance events (nested JSON). Includes: <br> - **activityCertainty** <br> - **activityType** (Creation, Acquisition, Gift, etc.) <br> - **activityTimeString / activityTimeEDTF** <br> - **assertionAuthor** <br> - **assertionNotes** <br> - **parties** (with party ID and role: agent, sender, receiver). | Example event: `"activityType": "aat:300417637__Gift", "activityTimeString": "May 1983", "parties": [{"id": "...", "role": "sender"}]` |
| **active**         | Boolean flag indicating if the record is active.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `"true"`                                                                                                                               |
:::

 [**MOMI Parties**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/10vfrd2ara0nSuynMWSFc2f1Bz1qN12eJ/view?usp=sharing)
 Contains information about the parties (collectors, dealers, artists, institutions, etc.) involved in those provenance events, as well as their relationships and roles.

::: {.callout-note collapse="true" title="Data Dictionary"}
#### MOMI Parties Data Dictionary
| Variable            | Description                                                                                                                  | Example                                                                        |
| ------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **\_id**            | Internal unique identifier (string) for the party.                                                                           | `"ZuW1191362122"`                                                              |
| **id**              | Same as `_id`, used as reference key in other files.                                                                         | `"ZuW1191362122"`                                                              |
| **label**           | Display label, usually prefixed with `#` and the party’s name.                                                               | `"#André Bazille"`                                                             |
| **type**            | Type of party: person, group, institution, etc.                                                                              | `"person"`, `"group"`                                                          |
| **gender**          | Gender of the person (AAT vocabulary).                                                                                       | `"aat:300411836"` (male), `"aat:300411837"` (female)                           |
| **ULAN**            | ULAN identifier and label if available.                                                                                      | `"ulan/500304375___Wildenstein and Co., Inc."`                                 |
| **WD**              | Wikidata identifier and label if available.                                                                                  | `"Q4013975___Virginia Museum of Fine Arts..."`                                 |
| **birthTimeString** | Birth year or date in human-readable string.                                                                                 | `"1860"`                                                                       |
| **birthTimeEDTF**   | Birth year/date in EDTF format.                                                                                              | `"1860"`, `"1934-03-27"`                                                       |
| **deathTimeString** | Death year/date in human-readable string.                                                                                    | `"1922"`                                                                       |
| **deathTimeEDTF**   | Death year/date in EDTF format.                                                                                              | `"1922"`                                                                       |
| **groupTypes**      | List of controlled terms describing group type.                                                                              | `["aat:300443854__art dealerships"]`                                           |
| **names**           | Alternative or variant names with type and value.                                                                            | `{"type": "aat:300417226__alternative titles", "value": "Kunstsalon Schames"}` |
| **locations**       | List of associated locations, sometimes with Wikidata links, city, country, province, and an `id`.                           | `{"city": "Frankfurt am Main", "country": "Germany", "WD": "Q1794..."}`        |
| **relations**       | List of relationships to other parties: includes relation `id`, related party `id`, and relation type (ULAN relation vocab). | `{"party": "iXw1994820523", "type": "gvp:ulan1541_spouse_of__spouse of"}`      |
:::
